entry.title: Friday night: Snow or ice pellets. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets or freezing rain this evening then to rain or drizzle after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening then becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023
